definition: pad/cushion/mat/to pad out/to fill a gap/to pay for sb/to advance (money)

sentences.english: The shoulders of his jacket were padded out to make them look square.
sentences.chinese: 他的外套塞上墊肩看起來平整而方正。

sentences.english: This is a jacket with padded shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 這是一件有墊肩的上裝。

sentences.english: The waist was slightly fitted, shoulders were lightly padded, and lapels were not very broad.
sentences.chinese: 腰身略收，肩部墊肩較薄，翻駁領不太寬。

sentences.english: There is a basic version of the suit, called "English-style shoulder pad suit".
sentences.chinese: 有一種西服的基本版型，叫“英式墊肩西服”。

sentences.english: Shoulder pads are safely for the players.
sentences.chinese: 有墊肩對運動員比較安全些。

sentences.english: Football and hockey players wear shoulder pads.
sentences.chinese: 美國橄欖球運動員戴墊肩以保護雙肩。

sentences.english: I really like those jackets with the shoulder pads in them. Where are those?
sentences.chinese: 我真的很喜歡那些有墊肩的外套在哪邊有呢？
